body.bibl: Horn, Cornelia B. “Prayer at the Threshold of the City in the Lives of Rabbula and Barsauma: Placing a Late Antique Bishop and a Monk in Spiritual and Spatial Perspectives.” In Prayer and the Ancient City: Influences of Urban Space, edited by Maik Patzelt, Jörg Rüpke, and Annette Weissenrieder, 345–68.
